channel.title: CVE Feed for Biplob Adhikari -- Accordions – Multiple Accordions or FAQs Builder (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Biplob Adhikari -- Accordions – Multiple Accordions or FAQs Builder (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-38104|2024-08-03T10:45:52.457Z -- biplob%20adhikari -- accordions%20%E2%80%93%20multiple%20accordions%20or%20faqs%20builder%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. WordPress Options Change (siteurl, users_can_register, default_role, admin_email and new_admin_email) vulnerability in Biplob Adhikari's Accordions – Multiple Accordions or FAQs Builder plugin (versions <= 2.0.3 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-45082|2024-08-03T14:01:31.488Z -- biplob%20adhikari -- accordions%20%E2%80%93%20multiple%20accordions%20or%20faqs%20builder%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Accordions plugin <= 2.0.3 on WordPress via &addons-style-name and &accordions_or_faqs_license_key.
